about_the_game:
Wanna create your wallpapers and have fun with Cumming Hotel's images in HD resolution?



This pack contains all adult scenes of Cumming Hotel WITHOUT backgrounds, size 1920x1080. By buying this DLC, you'll get:

  • 15 scenes, including the sexual ones revealed during the game OR;
  • 48 different poses (including the cumming ones) of Kyle and Bruce;

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Cumming Hotel\Adult Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: This pack contains all scenes from Cumming Hotel - including the adult ones. Some are based on gay men oral sex, anal sex, grupal sex, etc.
